org.turbogwt.net.http

Interface FluentRequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>

  • Type Parameters:
    RequestType - Type of data to be sent in the HTTP request body, when appropriate.
    ResponseType - Type of result from requests, when appropriate.
    All Superinterfaces:
    FluentRequest<RequestType,ResponseType>, HasUriParts, RequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FluentRequestImpl

    public interface FluentRequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>
extends FluentRequest<RequestType,ResponseType>, RequestSender<RequestType,ResponseType>
    This class provides fluent style request building and sending capabilities.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

      • deserializeAs

        <T> FluentRequestSender<RequestType,T> deserializeAs(Class<T> type)
                                                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Deserialize result to T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type to be deserialized.
        Parameters:
        type - The class from T.
        Returns:
        The new FluentRequest capable of deserializing T.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no Deserializer is registered for type T.

                                                throws IllegalArgumentException

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        type - The class from T.
        Returns:
        The new FluentRequest capable of de/serializing T.
        Throws:
